#required packages
```{r packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
```

read in data
```{r data}
pilot_data <- read_csv(here("data", "pilot1.csv"))
plot_data2 <- read_csv(here("data", "pilot2.csv"))
pilot_data <- rbind(pilot_data, plot_data2)
pilot_data <- pilot_data %>% select (-c(stimulus))
```
